content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-02-02 #21355 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in .
This was a PR to bump/v4.17.0, so I merged it directly rather than via bors. The emoji bot doesn't understand this, and thinks it was closed.

Kim's analysis is correct: the bot checks whether the PR title starts with [Merged by Bors] to decide whether a closed PR is merged into master or not.

The reason is that "most" PRs are merged by Bors. We could think of a more refined mechanism for catching also such cases: would that be useful?
I'm not too concerned. It's probably good to use bors for these PRs anyway.
